title: Deploy security fixes to production
description:
Deploy the security hardening changes to production.

## Pre-Deployment

- [ ] All tests passing locally
- [ ] Manual verification complete (h75)
- [ ] Code reviewed and approved
- [ ] Deployment plan communicated

## Deployment Steps

### 1. Deploy Worker

cd cloud/worker
wrangler deploy

### 2. Verify Deployment

# Check worker is responding
curl https://ticks.sh/health

# Check auth is enforced
curl -v https://ticks.sh/api/projects/test%2Fproject/state
# Should return 401 or 404

### 3. Monitor

Watch for:
- Error rate spikes
- Auth failures in logs
- User reports of connection issues

### 4. Rollback Plan

If issues detected:
wrangler rollback

## Post-Deployment Verification

### Client Compatibility

- [ ] tk CLI connects successfully
- [ ] Web UI sync works
- [ ] No regressions in existing functionality

### Security Verification

- [ ] Cannot access other users' projects
- [ ] Cannot modify other users' ticks
- [ ] Debug endpoints secured/removed

### Monitoring Setup

- [ ] Alert on unusual 401/403 rates
- [ ] Log auth failures for analysis
- [ ] Monitor DO error rates

## Communication

After successful deployment:
- Update CHANGELOG with security improvements
- Note in release notes that auth was strengthened
notes: 2026-01-24 11:44 - Blocked until manual security verification (h75) is complete. This is a human-only deployment task.
acceptance_criteria: Security fixes deployed to production, verified working
closed_reason: Deployed to production (Version ID: 586684a7-d30d-4a4a-9cf3-f9b1e58401a6). All production security tests passed: health ok, debug endpoints 404, auth required on all endpoints.
